{"id":"chatcmpl-439","object":"chat.completion","created":1767569279,"model":"gpt-oss:120b-cloud","system_fingerprint":"fp_ollama","choices":[{"index":0,"message":{"role":"assistant","content":"{
  "action": "continue",
  "batchFound": true,
  "newEvidence": [
    {
      "pointer": "1.1.1.p48",
      "excerpt": "Сейчас же двое коротышек схватили Звёздочкина – один за шиворот, другой за ноги – и стащили его с трибуны. Несколько коротышек подхватили Знайку на руки и потащили к трибуне.",
      "reason": "Paragraph mentions characters Звёздочкина and Знайку."
    },
    {
      "pointer": "1.1.1.p49",
      "excerpt": "– Пусть Знайка делает доклад! – кричали вокруг. – Долой Звёздочкина!",
      "reason": "Paragraph mentions characters Знайка and Звёздочкина."
    },
    {
      "pointer": "1.1.1.p50",
      "excerpt": "– Дорогие друзья! – говорил Знайка, очутившись на трибуне. – Я не могу делать доклад. Я не подготовился.",
      "reason": "Paragraph mentions character Знайка."
    }
  ],
  "progress": "Found three paragraphs with character mentions.",
  "needMoreContext": false
}","reasoning":"We need to produce JSON with action, batchFound, newEvidence, progress, needMoreContext.

Task: Collect ALL character mentions across the book. Return every paragraph where a person appears. Use evidence.pointer and evidence.excerpt exactly from batch items. Include aliases and nicknames. Do not stop early; scan whole book. maxEvidenceCount 500, but we have existing evidenceCount 36, we can add more, no need to stop early. So action likely "continue". Provide evidence for any paragraph where a person appears (character mentions). In this batch: items have paragraphs mentioning characters.

Item p48: mentions "Звёздочкина" and "Знайку". Those are persons (character). So include evidence.

Item p49: mentions "Звёздочкина" again, also "Знайка"? Actually text: "– Пусть Знайка делает доклад! – кричали вокруг. – Долой Звёздочкина!" It mentions "Знайка" and "Звёздочкина". So evidence.

Item p50: mentions "Знайка". So evidence.

We must not add evidence for pointers that appear in snapshot.recentEvidencePointers: they are "1.1.1.p40","1.1.1.p41","1.1.1.p42","1.1.1.p45","1.1.1.p47". Our pointers are p48, p49, p50, not listed, so fine.

Now produce newEvidence array with objects: pointer, excerpt (exact markdown), reason (1 sentence max). Reason: e.g., "Paragraph mentions characters Звёздочкина and Знайку." Must not claim order. Provide brief.

We have three evidence entries.

Progress: maybe "Found three paragraphs with character mentions."

needMoreContext: false (we have enough info in batch).

action: since we haven't reached maxEvidenceCount, continue. batchFound true.

Thus JSON."},"finish_reason":"stop"}],"usage":{"prompt_tokens":981,"completion_tokens":700,"total_tokens":1681}}
